## serialization.registry.register() function

Registers the given serializer so that it can be used for serialization and deserialization.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function register(name: string, serializer: ISerializer): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the serializer to register. |
|  serializer | [ISerializer](./blockly.serialization.iserializer.md) | The serializer to register. |

**Returns:**

void
